metadata.name: start_drag_swf_4
metadata.description: Tests START_DRAG opcode (0x27) - Makes a sprite/MovieClip draggable with comprehensive edge cases including type conversions for target (string conversion), boolean flags (number conversion), and constraint coordinates (number conversion)

missing_features: Graphics rendering (requires SDL3/Vulkan for actual mouse dragging and sprite position updates)
Mouse position tracking and event handling
Visual drag feedback and constraint rectangle rendering
edge_cases_tested: basic_drag - Basic drag operation without constraints
lock_center - Drag with center locked to mouse position
constrained_drag - Drag with rectangular constraint bounds
type_conversion_numeric_target - Target as number converted to string
type_conversion_string_flags - Boolean flags as strings converted to numbers
type_conversion_string_coords - Constraint coordinates as strings converted to numbers
